replies.msg:
farewell my friend-
for three years of company,
and comfort;
though it may well be that,
we shall never cross path again;
I am truly grateful,
in this short moment;
for all I see is sincerity,
and camaraderie;

till the day we lock eyes again,
farewell my friend, alas!
